meta.title: Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol • Inna Gurina • Vocal and Piano Teacher
meta.description: Welcome to Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol. I am Inna, a professional vocal and piano teacher with 12 years of experience, offering personalized lessons for all ages in Russian and English.
meta.keywords: Vocal lessons in Limassol, Piano lessons in Limassol, Vocal and Piano teacher in Limassol, Limassol Vocal Teacher, Limassol Piano Teacher

navbar.brand: Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol

header.title: Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol
header.intro: Hello! I’m Inna Gurina, a professional teacher, offering personalized lessons for all ages and skill levels in Limassol.

about.badge: Inna Gurina - Professional Vocal and Piano Teacher
about.missionText1: In the educational process, I use a modern Western teaching methodology, my knowledge gained from studying music technology at the University of York, and many years of live performance experience.

location.title: Location
location.address: The studio is located at 4a Douriou Ippou St., Limassol

teachingSpace.title: Teaching Space
teachingSpace.description: I conduct most of my lessons in a specially equipped studio. I also offer lessons via Skype and Zoom in both Russian and English.

cta.getInTouch: Get in touch to book your first lesson
